about_the_game:
”OBJECTION!”

The courtroom chaos continues with Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney – Justice for All Original Soundtrack, making its Western debut for the very first time! With 25 tracks from all four cases, enjoy a 54+ minute soundtrack re-authored from the original, high quality source material. Formats include MP3 (V0), FLAC (16-bit), and AAC (VBR).
